title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label is still visible.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label should disappear.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Preview the PDF.
4. Observe that the label should disappear, but it is still visible.
